members.name: Alexander Kazakov
members.desc: My primary responsibilities were implementing the player controller, creating, animating and implementing assets such as the characters and creating the website

members.name: Alvar Trojenborg
members.desc: My main responsibilities included implementing and designing the game-loop (how the game progresses) and creating slick and informative HUD/UI text and menu elements on screen. Handling the main game-loop required a broader perspective on the project and understanding how each part interacted with each other. Furthermore I was also responsible for the  kill zone/respawning and the 4 player split screen functionality. What's more, I ideated many of the item functionalities and got the pleasure to help Sofia with implementing a few of the items. Finally, I also contributed with key concept art.
